title: Massachusetts - Poverty rate 2000 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Percentage of population. In total the number of data points it has is 19.
In general Percentage of population has stayed the same over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2004 and 2005.
Maximum Percentage of population, about 11.9 was reported at Year 2012, and 2013
Minimum Percentage of population about 8.7 was reached at Year 2001
